cause.description:
Exactly what it says on the tin.
1. The Jewish People have a right to a state of their own
2. The actions of groups such as Hezbollah are unacceptable
3. A stand must be made against such groups.
4. It is perfectly acceptable for Israel to defend itself against such groups
5. Rock on Daniel Cohen!
cause.mission: Promote Zionism among Jews (or tolerance among non-Jews) and to make a stand against groups such as Hezbollah.
cause.name: JFZ ( Jews for Zionism)
